Key Match Events: Jason Holder took 4 wickets for 7 runs in 3.4 overs
Brandon King scored a half-century (55 runs)
Post-Match Reflections: Jason Holder expressed the challenge of being consistent
Eoin Morgan focused on improving for the next games
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies won the toss and gave England first use of the bouncy track
England limped to 49 for 7 at the end of the 12th over
Others: Sheldon Cottrell took 2 wickets for 30 runs
